title: What is the date for the Karnataka SSLC results announcement? - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually, the Karnataka SSLC Results will be get released at the end of May. In fact, it purely depends on number of candidates appeared for the SSLC examination 2020. As per the reports, for example, there were 6 lakhs and more people appeared for the Karnataka 10th class examination this year. Depends on the number of students appears for the Examination, the result declaration will get delayed. For the year 2020, the board is planning to release the official Karnataka SSLC Result 2020 by 3rd week of may. Sooner or later isn't the matter, the results should be the best. 3000+ centers works hard for valuation purposes and it will be always the best as per the reports says.
See the image below or else logon to the official website this image was taken on 08/March/2018.
